about_the_game:
Start fresh in the charming town of Hearthstone Bay! Inherit your grandmother’s cafe, a warm and welcoming hub for locals, and step into a world where community bonds are just as essential as crafting the perfect cup of coffee. As you connect with the townsfolk, you’ll uncover secrets, restore the cafe, and work toward revitalizing the entire town.

Design and Run Your Dream Cafe

Create a cozy space that reflects your style and the spirit of Hearthstone Bay. Decorate your cafe with warm decor and unique furniture, making it feel like home for both you and your customers.


Hone Your Barista Skills

Master the art of coffee with a growing list of recipes. Start with the basics, discover community favorites, and experiment to create new flavors as you become the town’s favorite barista.

Build Trust and Relationships

Each resident has a unique story, dreams, and struggles. Befriend the townsfolk, earn their trust, and uncover their personal histories. Your reliability status affects product prices, customer loyalty, and quest opportunities, making every interaction meaningful.


Dynamic Market Prices

!!! Your Reliability Status influences the deals you get from suppliers. Maintain high reliability to secure the best prices, or face higher costs if trust falters, adding a strategic layer to managing your cafe’s finances :). !!!


Balance Prices and Manage Customer Satisfaction

Set prices that keep customers happy and sustain your cafe’s growth. Your reliability status plays a role in customer loyalty and supplier prices, so each decision matters.

Hire and Build a Loyal Team

As your cafe grows, hire baristas and waitstaff to support your business. Each team member brings unique skills, so choose carefully to create an efficient, inviting atmosphere for customers.

Join Festivals and Community Events

Participate in local festivals and challenges that strengthen your bond with the town. From barista competitions to fishing festivals, there’s always something to celebrate and a new way to connect with the community.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Start a new life in cozy Hearthstone Bay! Restore your grandmother’s cafe, sharpen your barista skills, and build bonds with the locals as you uncover the town’s hidden secrets! Enjoy festivals, explore nature, and bring warmth back to Hearthstone Bay, one cup and connection at a time.
